title: Pfizer Director leaks plans to Create Viruses
cleaned_text:
The full project veritas video is literally linked and Jordan Walker is Pfizer's director of research and development. What are you on about???

Are your brains not working?

Again I will reiterate. This is Pfizer's director of research and development admitting that Pfizer and working on gain of function research. Mutating corona viruses as a "preemptive" measure for more covid variations so they can start work on a vaccine prior to the new variant. This they are keeping under wraps and are testing these new variations on apes.

What about this video would lead you to think it's a joke???

Did any of you even watch it? Where's the joke? Jordan literally admits to it all????

The replies in this thread and literally so dumb it's making my head boggle.
